alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 12 at 3:08PM CST until March 13 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Portions of central, southwest and west central Louisiana and southeast Texas. * WHEN...From 9 PM CST this evening to 9 AM CDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Southern Jasper; Southern Newton; Tyler
